short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture timestamps from videos with markdown format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy the video timestamp to your clipboard with a shortcut (Ctrl + Shift + M) and use it to take notes. You can customize the template and also set some time offsets (in seconds) to adjust the copied timestamp.
Be productive for your personal PKM!

Currently supports YouTube only.
